content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 10}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 17, "index": 12}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 15}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 57, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 43}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The warped planks needed for crafting the sword can be made from the stripped_warped_stem in slot 37, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: The warped planks have been crafted in the crafting grid, so I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: wooden_sword
inventory=[{"type": "vindicator_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 10}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 17, "index": 12}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 15}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "tropical_fish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "leather_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "spruce_pressure_plate", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "sticky_piston", "quantity": 8, "index": 33}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 57, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 37, "index": 40}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 42}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 43}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a wooden sword, I need to place planks in the top left corner of the crafting grid and a stick below it. I will start by moving the warped planks from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
